events.message: I am filing a claim regarding a severe car accident that occurred last night on Main Street causing significant damage to my vehicle.
The reported incident has been categorized under Auto Accident following the description of the collision and vehicle damage provided.
An insurance agent has now been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the claims process.
Your claim has been formally acknowledged by our team and we are committed to assisting you as promptly as possible.
Please submit all relevant documents including police reports, vehicle registration, and photos of the accident damage for further review.
All requested documents have been submitted successfully via the online portal to support the evaluation of your claim.
The investigation process has commenced to verify the details of the collision and assess the extent of the vehicle damage.
The investigation is now complete, confirming the cause of the accident and validating the damages claimed on your vehicle.
A settlement offer based on the investigation findings has been proposed and sent for your consideration and approval.
We received your feedback accepting the settlement offer and expressing satisfaction with how your claim was handled by our agents.
Your claim has been approved based on all submitted evidence and accepted terms of the settlement agreement.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued and should reflect in your bank account within three business days.
The claim has now been officially closed following the completion of payment and no outstanding issues reported by you.
All case files and documents related to this auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
